Posts.Content: zowiecat wrote: I have a lot of things going on, so let me list symptoms 1. history of bc on both sides 2 right breast feels like it is on fire 3 my nipple has changed 4 I have a flakey rash on nipple just right side 5 brest is warm to touch 6 I am diabetic and since I had a mammogram my insulin requirements have skyrocketed apparently if it something breast cancer is known to cause resistance 7 I have had some blood drips from my right breast. my pcp sent me for mamo and at time they did extra pics and utrasonds but nurse telkls me my mammogram is clear nothing to worry about. I have made an appointment to see my obgyn but am I just crazy am I over reacting do these sound like symptoms that anybody else has had. I am seriously wondering about my pcp nurse telling me blood from my nipple is nothing to worry about. any comment or help greatly appreciated. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: very concerned but at a loss zowiecat Kicks
